document.full_text: austrian finance minister maria fekter backed french counterpart christine lagarde for the top job at the international monetary fund and threw her weight behind austrian banks in the debate over new capital rules.
document.title: austria backs lagarde for imf job
lines_and_colors: austrian finance minister maria fekter backed french counterpart christine lagarde for the top job at the international monetary fund and threw her weight behind austrian banks in the debate over new capital rules.
